ROOT.GetIdByName: SELECT DISTINCT REGIONID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_PARTITION_INFO WHERE REGIONNAME IN ({0})
ROOT.GetRealData: SELECT DATETIME,ZONENAME,GENPSUM,TRANPSUM,FLOAT2,MAXLOADP,PMAR,KEYGENMARP,GENPMAX,TRANMVA,KEYTRANMARP FROM BX_BINFO.ACT_FYD_FYDPHB_REALTIME WHERE DATETIME=(SELECT MAX(DATETIME) FROM BX_BINFO.ACT_FYD_FYDPHB_REALTIME) ORDER BY ZONENAME
ROOT.GetFutureTime: SELECT MIN(T1) FROM ( SELECT MAX(T1) AS T1 FROM BX_BINFO.ACT_FYD_FYDPHB_FUTURESTATE_FHYC UNION SELECT MAX(T1) FROM BX_BINFO.ACT_FYD_FYDPHB_FUTURESTATE_YD UNION SELECT MAX(T1) FROM BX_BINFO.ACT_FYD_FYDPHB_FUTURESTATE_ZDYD )
